title: Greek salad with tahini dressing
ingredients: ['200g feta cheese', '1 small cos lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces', '1/2 cucumber, halved lengthways and sliced', '350g large plum tomatoes, sliced', '1 small red onion, halved and thinly sliced', '20 stoned Kalamata olives', '4 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 tbsp tahini', '1 tbsp lemon juice', '4 large sprigs of fresh flat-leaf parsley']
